mapper.select: SELECT t.course_id, t.course_name, t.score_predict FROM scorepredict t WHERE t.stu_number = #{stuNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into scorepredict (spid, stu_number, course_id, course_name, score_predict) values (#{spid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{stuNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{courseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{courseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{scorePredict,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into scorepredict
spid,
stu_number,
course_id,
course_name,
score_predict,

#{stuNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{courseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{courseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.update:
update scorepredict
stu_number = #{stuNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
course_id = #{courseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
course_name = #{courseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
score_predict = #{scorePredict,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where spid = #{spid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
